page.title: 07Entertainment
page.content: Of those who were questioned, the majority were O.A.Ps. Many of them still enjoy going out to dinner and ballroom dancing remains very popular with this generation. With the younger generations the discoteque and the cinema continue to attract the majority. The cinema audiences are diminishing because of the growing impact of video. Bingo is still popular with the O.A.Ps. The traditional skills of reading appears to have lost ground to the computer and video games. Theatre has maintained popular appeal as a result of the pantomime.
